entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 16 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 16 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 18.
